Thank god there's still one active torrent for this game on here. For anyone who's not sure what they are getting themselves into. Let me tell you this, it's a lot better than 4 overall.

There are somethings that 4 did right mostly AI wise and graphics, but other than that, 3 dominates the gameplay aspect. Ohh also you can easily command both AI squads and it has bots in CoOp (In 4 you can't command bots in CoOp)

How to run SWAT 3 on Win7 x86:
1. Install three updates from this site http://sierrahelp.com/Patches-Updates/Patches-Updates-Games/SWATUpdates.html from SWAT 3: Elite Edition section. 
2. Download this crack http://m0004.gamecopyworld.com/games/pc_swat3.shtml#SWAT 3: TGOTY v2.1 [US] No-CD/Fixed EXE 
3. Right click on c:sierraswat.exe, click properties and set compatibility mode to Win XP SP3. If direct error still pops out set the "run in 640 x 480 screen resolution" option. 

PS. The serial key is BAC2 BAB2 BAB2 BAB2 2352.
